1370: Assceric moved to Die Camp.A.7 after marriage.
Got married to Oderada at age 23 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Oderada, Trame, at age 24.
1373: Had a son with Oderada, Brandekijn, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Oderada, Godeweris, at age 27.
1376: Lost daughter Godeweris when Godeweris was 3 years old.
1377: Lost his wife Oderada while she was giving birth to Hornekinga in 1377.
Became caretaker of Trame, Brandekijn, Hornekinga at age 31.
1390: Lost son Hornekinga when Hornekinga was 14 years old.
